/usr/bin/c++    -pthread -fPIC -pedantic -g -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-switch -Wno-multichar -Wsequence-point -Wformat-security -mssse3 -std=c++11 -std=c++11   CMakeFiles/rs-software-device.dir/rs-software-device.cpp.o  -o rs-software-device -rdynamic ../../librealsense2.so.2.16.3 -lGLU -lGL -lm -lglfw -lusb-1.0 -Wl,-rpath,/home/ruijie/Desktop/librealsense-master/Ruijie1_build:
